description:
The Arch Linux-based CachyOS distribution has a new ISO release for June 2024 that adds support for T2 MacBooks, a Handheld edition, and various other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Arch Linux-Based CachyOS Adds Handheld Edition and T2 MacBook Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Arch Linux-Based CachyOS Adds Handheld Edition and T2 MacBook Support
